content.p: The University of Nottingham welcomes creative and curious minds! We provide a supportive, innovative and research-led environment in which you can continue your education. If you are thinking about a change of career, want to top up your skills or deepen your knowledge then we have over 320 postgraduate courses to suit. Thinking of enrolling for a postgraduate qualification? We warmly welcome back alumni wishing to continue their education at The University of Nottingham. Nottingham University Business School offers a range of executive education for businesses, organisations, teams or individuals. With specialisms including sustainable business practice and entrepreneurship, all courses offer a broad range of international knowledge and experience. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8373 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8657 email: alumnirelations@nottingham.edu.my
